tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN Despite) (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS exggerations))) (, ,) (NP (EX there)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (NP (NN something)) (ADJP (RB very) (JJ smooth))) (PP (IN about) (NP (NP (JJ it-black) (NN humour)) (CC and) (NP (JJ crazy) (NNS sub-plots))))) (. .)))
